name: science project
description:
story: one day there was a kid that needed a science project for his school. he took  pure entity and put it into his machine the machine EVOLVED the entity to... fire or maybe water? let me explain. things went wrong and now not that u cant only select a evolve, the machine has sent a giant robot to kill the entity.

gameplay: you are playing as the entity. when u will get into the arena you will evolve into a power after a few seconds. it can be FIRE or WATER. you cant control which one you will get, each one of them has bonuses and... bad sides. you need to kill the monster bi hitting it and killing it. if u have enough skills doing that wont be a problem.

controls:

 WASD to move

SPACE BAR to shoot
